name: Hardest 11.8 "Ill-Gotten Gaines" Trivia Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 11 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was tied to a fence outside Cheers in the cold opening?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	He called Carla "a dwarf". He asked Sam to untie him but Sam wouldn't because Cliff's time wasn't up yet. Sam didn't want to anger Carla lest she should tie him to the fence as well.

questions.text: Where did the Cheers gang have Thanksgiving dinner?
questions.explanation:
At the bar.

	Sam said it would be pot luck. Rebecca was a little offended that Sam didn't want to come to her place with the others. Then she was happy because they were going to have a turkey.

questions.text: Who couldn't remember if his father-in-law was dead or not?
questions.explanation:
Norm.

	He told Woody that he'd never allow his father-in-law to talk to him the way Mr. Gains talked to Woody. Cliff then said, "I thought your father-in-law was dead" Norm replied, "You know, he might be."

questions.text: Who was having an affair in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Gaines

	He was having an affair with his brother's wife. He thought Woody caught them in act, so he became super nice to Woody.

questions.text: What did Woody think the person having an affair was doing?
questions.explanation:
Exercising.

	He thought Mr. Gaines was doing push-ups. Mr. Gaines was worried Woody would tell everyone he was having an affair.

Woody.

	Mr. Gaines bought him a boat to keep him silent. Woody thought he just wanted to be good friends after Woody's speech about treating him with more respect.

questions.text: What did Norm bring to Cheers?
questions.explanation:
His recliner.

	Sam told him it was only for the day. Norm said, "Thanksgiving just wouldn't be the same without it, Sam."

questions.text: What kind of decorations did Rebecca have for the Thanksgiving dinner?
questions.explanation:
Witches and skeletons.

	She said "The witches came over with the Pilgrims". Then she went on to say that the Pilgrims burned the witches at the stake which left skeletons. Then the Pilgrims were free to make a big dinner.

questions.text: Where did Rebecca get the dinnerware for Thanksgiving?
questions.explanation:
Melville's.

	Melville was closed and John was at the Cape. Little did they know Melville's had a silent alarm which Rebecca set off.

questions.text: Who sat with the kids at the kids table?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	Cliff was offended at first. Then Sam told him it was an honor to be entrusted to take care of the children.
